CustomField.formula: IF(Term_of_Lease_Years__c > 0, Contract_Start_Date__c + (Term_of_Lease_Years__c *365), IF(Term_of_Lease_Months__c > 0,ADDMONTHS(Contract_Start_Date__c , Term_of_Lease_Months__c ), IF(Term_of_Lease_Days__c > 0,Contract_Start_Date__c + Term_of_Lease_Days__c , NULL)))
CustomField.label: Contract End Date
